thread.title: Expat pensions: should you leave your defined benefit scheme?

author: Alison Steed
title: Expat pensions: should you leave your defined benefit scheme?
text: Expat Money Expat pensions: should you leave your defined benefit scheme? In the first in a series of weekly columns, our expat money specialist explains why public sector workers thinking of moving abroad need to take stock of their pension options Soldiers who plan to march off abroad once they retire have some decisions to make about their pensions Photo: Bethany Clarke/Getty Images By Alison Steed
